familyMemberEthics.description: Former director of Trump CPS Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income and is part of other entity structures.

familyMemberEthics.description: Former member/president of Trump CPS LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $1,000,001 - $5,000,000 in rent income from TRUMP CPS LLC, valued at $25,000,001 - $50,000,000. Underlying Assets: commercial and residential real estate. Location: New York, NY.
